items.title: A Must-Read about Health Inequity and Harm Reduction
items.description: Linda Villarosa's Pulitzer Prize-winning look at the hidden toll of racism on the health of Americans is a searing wake-up call.

items.title: Sheep Solve Hugh Jackman’s Murder!
items.description: A tour of Louise Penny's book collection, cozy crime dramas to watch right now, and more mystery news and links

items.title: 11 Romances Set Around the World
items.description: Expand your romance reading horizons with these romances set around the world, from the beaches of Viet Nam to Joseon dynasty Korea.

items.title: Exciting New and Recent Middle Grade Novels
items.description: These new and recent middle grade novels feature kids figuring out school and friendships, solving family mysteries, and more.

items.title: Judge These Books By Their Covers: Read a Book from a “Best Book Covers” List
items.description: Go ahead. Judge these books by their covers because their covers are among the best of the best.
